  • Classes in controller used by controller 
    Class and Description
    Observable
    This interface rappresent an object that can be observed by a an object that implements the interface Updatable
    Player
    This interface rappresent a common player
    UpdatableObserversManager
    This class manage the observers that implements the interface Updatable This class can be extended from a class that must be oberved from an Updatable object
